title: Thirtynothing
description: On his thirtieth birthday, Dig Ryan is reunited with his first love, Delilah, after a twelve-year separation, an encounter that does not please Dig's best friend, Nadine, who calls in her own first love, Phil, to help resolve the situation, in a zany novel about friendship, romance, and growing up, by the author of Ralph's Party. Original.
author: Lisa Jewell
